content: valentine s day beanie knit pattern designed by jeri sullivan ig @jeriknits #vdaybeanie sizing child size is 8 tall & fits 18 head around adult size small is 8 tall & fits 20 head around adult size medium is 9 tall & fits 22 head around adult size large is 9 tall & fits 24 head around yarn worsted weight in 2 colors child size main color ~80 yards & contrast color ~ 65 yards adult sizes main color ~ 100 yards & contrast color ~ 85 yards needles & notions 16 circular needle us size 8/5 0mm for body 16 circular needle us size 7/4 5mm for ribbing 1 set double pointed needles us size 8 for decreases stitch marker large eye sewing needle & scissors pattern instructions child size is listed first and adult sizes are listed in brim using ribbing needles cast on 80 88 96 104 place marker and join in the round *k1 p1* around for 1 5 1 5 2 2 inches body using larger needles knit 2 2 3 3 rounds then proceed to chart follow chart changing colors as noted being careful to keep floats loose to prevent colorwork from being too tight after chart cut contrast color and knit 2 2 3 3 rounds in main color before starting decrease section decreases same for all sizes switch to double pointed needles as needed round 1 *k6 k2tog* repeat to end of round round 2 and all remaining even rounds knit round 3 *k5 k2tog* repeat to end of round round 5 *k4 k2tog* repeat to end of round round 7 *k3 k2tog* repeat to end of round round 9 *k2 k2tog* repeat to end of round round 11 *k1 k2tog* repeat to end of round round 13 *k2tog* repeat to end of round finishing up after last decrease round cut yarn leaving approx 8 inches thread the tail onto the sewing needle and pull the end through the remaining stitches to close the hole then weave in remaining ends colorwork chart the chart is an 8 stitch repeat that is worked from right to left from the bottom up written colorwork instructions if you prefer to follow written instructions vs charts see below *repeat each instruction to the end of round round 1 *k4 in mc k1 in cc k3 in mc round 2 *k3 in mc k3 in cc k2 in mc round 3 *k2 in mc k5 in cc k1 in mc round 4 *k1 in mc k7 in cc round 5 *k1 in mc k3 in cc k1 in mc k3 in cc round 6 *k2 in mc k1 in cc k3 in mc k1 in cc k1 in mc round 7 *k8 in mc round 8 *k1 in cc k7 in mc round 9 *k2 in cc k5 in mc k1 in cc round 10 *k3 in cc k3 in mc k2 in cc round 11 *k4 in cc k1 in mc k3 in cc round 12
